quote-source: Pablo Neruda, One Hundred Love Sonnets: XVII, The Essential Neruda: Selected Poems, edited by Mark Eisner. Copyright Â© 2004 City Lights Books, translated By Mark Eisner
quote-text:
I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where, Â 
I love you directly without problems or pride:
I love you like this because I donât know any other way to love,
except in this form in which I am not nor are you, Â 
so close that your hand upon my chest is mine, Â 
so close that your eyes close with my dreams.
